abstract: Netherlands' Tom Dumoulin wins opening individual time trial of Giro d’Italia by hundredth of a second.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Tight Finish as Giro Opens
headline.main: Tom Dumoulin Has Tight Finish as Giro Opens

snippet: Dumoulin of the Netherlands won the opening individual time trial of the Giro d’Italia by the narrowest of margins.
lead_paragraph: Dumoulin of the Netherlands won the opening individual time trial of the Giro d’Italia by the narrowest of margins.
